data.name: AccountDNECreating
data.value: The account '{0}' does not exist. Attempting to create...

data.name: InvalidPacketSizeFromBnet
data.value: Battle.net specified an invalid packet size.

data.name: InvalidUsernameOrPassword
data.value: Invalid username and/or password.

data.name: LoginProofClientProofFailed
data.value: The server rejected your password.

data.name: LoginProofCustomError
data.value: The server rejected your password with a specific error message: '{0}'

data.name: LoginProofRegisterEmail
data.value: Logon success! Battle.net has requested that you register an e-mail address with this account. You will not be notified again.

data.name: LoginProofServerProofFailed
data.value: The server was unable to verify that it knew your password; you may be connecting to a malicious server.

data.name: LoginProofSuccess
data.value: Logon success! Entering chat...

data.name: NameCreateFail10
data.value: The specified user name contained too few alphanumeric characters.

data.name: NameCreateFail11
data.value: The specified user name contained too many adjacent punctuation characters.

data.name: NameCreateFail12
data.value: The specified user name contained too many punctuation characters.

data.name: NameCreateFail7
data.value: The specified user name was too short or blank. User names should be at least 3 characters long.

data.name: NameCreateFail8
data.value: The specified user name contained one or more illegal characters.

data.name: NameCreateFail9
data.value: The specified user name contained one or more illegal words.

data.name: NameCreateFailOther
data.value: The specified user name already exists.

data.name: NameCreateSuccess
data.value: Successfully created account name '{0}'. Logging in...

data.name: ReceivedTooLongMessage
data.value: Battle.net has sent a packet that exceeds the maximum length supported.

data.name: UnableToConnectFmt
data.value: The connection was unable to complete a connection to {0}:{1} ('{2}'). More information is available in the exception.

data.name: UnableToResolveHostFmt
data.value: Your computer was unable to resolve host name '{0}'. If necessary, add an entry to %SystemRoot%\system32\drivers\etc\hosts, or flush your DNS resolver cache, and try again.

data.name: UpgradeRequestedUnsupported
data.value: Battle.net has requested that your account be upgraded, but this is not supported. Please upgrade your account via the official Warcraft III client.

data.name: War3ServerValidationFailed
data.value: The Warcraft 3 server validation check failed. You may not be connecting to a legitimate Battle.net server.
